sentences.english: Spend 15 minutes a day having a giggling session.
sentences.chinese: 每天花費15分鐘玩一玩“哈哈笑”。

sentences.english: He laughs at his jokes right along with them.
sentences.chinese: 他和觀衆一直在哈哈笑，隨着他的笑話。
